questions.name: By when do you need the capital?
Project Description
questions.value: This 687.5 kW roof-mounted solar PV project is being constructed to offset some of our utility usage and cost. The project will be on the roof of our existing facility. The project will reduce our annual energy costs by $83K/yr. We have been awarded a $999,871 REAP grant for this project.

questions.name: Describe the use of funds
questions.value: We will use the funds to pay the contractor for this project. Once paid, we will submit for REAP grant reimbursement. We also receive a 30% tax credit on this project.

questions.name: Which of the options above is a better fit for your project?
Do you have any preferred terms or requirements?
questions.value:
For the minimum, this would be a bridge loan for the REAP grant + monetization of the ITC (2 years, 10%)

If we were able to get the max amount, it would be best for a longer term (5 years, at 6.5%)
